body: That dude's an asshole
Also, it's a doujin without an ending. I like to think that the teacher made her happy after that, as twisted as he is. She's fine, guys.

Oh look, an NTR that actually tries instead of being the typical lonely housewife with a husband who is on a business trip. Retards think this is "weak" because it's a shota getting cucked, therefore less relatable. The teacher basically ruined the girl's chance at a first love, took it away, going against her wishes to stop the sexual relationship that they had until then. It's fucking great, and this is literally the cutest loli I've ever seen.
